content.data:
In Windows 10 click the Windows Start Button   
 then scroll to and select the S2M Optimizer 11 Group.

In previous versions of Windows go to  Start 
 | All Programs | S2M Optimizer 11
There are four possible options in the Startup Group:

S2M 
	 Optimizer 11  - Launches the S2M Optimizer. 
 S2M 
	 Optimizer 11 Help  - Opens this Help System. 
 System 
	 Information -  Opens the Vero System Information Utility. 
 Update 
	 S2M Optimizer 11 Databases  - Launches the Update Database Utility 
	 which compacts and repairs S2M Optimizer Database Files.

S2M 
	 Optimizer 11  - Launches the S2M Optimizer.

S2M 
	 Optimizer 11  - Launches the S2M Optimizer.

S2M 
	 Optimizer 11 Help  - Opens this Help System.

S2M 
	 Optimizer 11 Help  - Opens this Help System.

System 
	 Information -  Opens the Vero System Information Utility.

System 
	 Information -  Opens the Vero System Information Utility.

Update 
	 S2M Optimizer 11 Databases  - Launches the Update Database Utility 
	 which compacts and repairs S2M Optimizer Database Files.

Update 
	 S2M Optimizer 11 Databases  - Launches the Update Database Utility 
	 which compacts and repairs S2M Optimizer Database Files.
